subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The Oklahoma training track at Saratoga is a timeless oasis, loved by Hall of Fame trainers like D. Wayne Lukas and Bob Baffert.
snippet: The Oklahoma training track at Saratoga is a timeless oasis, loved by Hall of Fame trainers like D. Wayne Lukas and Bob Baffert.
